pr_title: Abort sorting in case of local agg sort queue overflow

timeline.message:
Abort sorting in case of local sort overflow

In case the local agg sorter queue gets full, stop iterating on current
result set and fetching next page.

Slight refactor of the fix. Add testing

- Raise an exception on queue insertion failure, instead of running the
  failure callback.
- Add testing for the change.
- Correct stale documentation.

Minor refactoring of testing

- drop Mockito use, not needed in current test form.
